mapper.insert: insert into review (writer, content, visit_date, score, img, res_idx) values (#{writer}, #{content}, #{visit_date}, #{score}, #{img}, #{res_idx})
mapper.select: select r1.*, r2.name as res_name, r2.address as res_address, a.name as area from review r1 left join restaurant r2 on r1.res_idx = r2.idx left join area a on r2.area_idx = a.idx where r1.res_idx = #{res_idx} order by r1.idx desc offset #{offset} rows fetch first #{perCount} rows only
select count(*) from review where res_idx = #{res_idx}
select * from review where res_idx = #{idx} order by idx desc
select r1.res_idx, r2.name as res_name from review r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.res_idx = r2.idx where r1.res_idx = #{res_idx}
select r1.*,r2.name as res_name from review r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.res_idx = r2.idx where r1.res_idx = #{res_idx} order by r1.idx fetch first 10 rows only
select img from review where res_idx = #{res_idx}
